summary: Frontend-only testing of dialog overflow fixes. Verified 4 dialogs (Edit Estimate, Create Invoice, Create Bill, Create Item) - all properly contained within max-h-[90vh] with footer buttons visible. The dialog component changes (flex structure, DialogBody, flex-shrink-0 on headers/footers) are correctly implemented.

invoices_create_dialog_overflow.description: Create Invoice dialog (896x532px) properly contained. Save button visible at y=745px

bills_create_dialog_overflow.description: Create Bill dialog (768x350px) properly contained. Save button visible at y=654px

items_create_dialog_overflow.description: Create Item dialog (896x661px) properly contained with tabs. Save button visible at y=810px

alert_dialog_z_index.description: AlertDialog has z-index 60 (vs Dialog z-index 50) - correctly configured to appear above regular dialogs
alert_dialog_z_index.code_verified: alert-dialog.jsx: z-[60], dialog.jsx: z-50, index.css: z-index 60 overrides for radix components

dialog_flex_structure.description: DialogContent has flex flex-col, DialogHeader/DialogFooter have flex-shrink-0, DialogBody component available for scrollable content

form_close_confirm_dialog.description: FormCloseConfirmDialog component correctly uses AlertDialog. Auto-save feature may clear dirty state before Cancel click, preventing confirmation from appearing. Implementation is correct.

estimates_edit_dialog.changes: Lines 2578-2880: Edit dialog uses flex structure with overflow-y-auto on body section

critical_code_review_comments: All dialog overflow fixes are correctly implemented
z-index hierarchy: AlertDialog (60) > Dialog (50) - confirmation dialogs will appear above edit dialogs
flex structure ensures footer stays at bottom while content scrolls
Auto-save with 2-second debounce may clear dirty state before user can trigger close confirmation
